SC_Log.name: SC_Log
SC_Log.comment: write to the log file, level 0 - fatal error, 1 - error, 2 - warning, 3 - info

SC_Osi.name: SC_Osi
SC_Osi.comment: write text on the screen (left bottom corner)

SC_TheEnd.name: SC_TheEnd
SC_TheEnd.comment: used on the end of the game

SC_CreatePtc_Ext.name: SC_CreatePtc_Ext
SC_CreatePtc_Ext.comment: creates particle in nod, but subeffects are in world space

SC_CreatePtcInNodSpace_Ext.name: SC_CreatePtcInNodSpace_Ext
SC_CreatePtcInNodSpace_Ext.comment: all particle is in nod space ( better for flames f.e.)

SC_Radio_Get.name: SC_Radio_Get
SC_Radio_Get.comment: no radio is active - returns FALSE

SC_RadioSet2D.name: SC_RadioSet2D
SC_RadioSet2D.comment: TRUE - from this moment all inserted SC_SpeechRadio... will be in 2D

SC_SpeechSet3Dto3Dincamera.name: SC_SpeechSet3Dto3Dincamera
SC_SpeechSet3Dto3Dincamera.comment: TRUE - all 3D speech will be played in camera ( useful for briefings)

SC_GetPos_VecRz.name: SC_GetPos_VecRz
SC_GetPos_VecRz.comment: pos or rz can be NULL

SC_MakeBurning.name: SC_MakeBurning
SC_MakeBurning.comment: sets on fire everything in sphere (objects and players)

SC_PreloadBES.name: SC_PreloadBES
SC_PreloadBES.comment: preload, max id is from interval [1,SC_PRELOAD_BES_MAXID]

SC_GetRndWp.name: SC_GetRndWp
SC_GetRndWp.comment: returns	- TRUE - found random wp in sphere

SC_EnableBloodWhenHit.name: SC_EnableBloodWhenHit
SC_EnableBloodWhenHit.comment: default is TRUE ( function written just for tutorial )

SC_EnableCharacterLOD.name: SC_EnableCharacterLOD
SC_EnableCharacterLOD.comment: default is TRUE, use FALSE for briefings and other noingame special situations

SC_PC_SetControl.name: SC_PC_SetControl
SC_PC_SetControl.comment: FALSE - camera is not set in PC and PC cannot be controlled

SC_PC_EnableMovementAndLooking.name: SC_PC_EnableMovementAndLooking
SC_PC_EnableMovementAndLooking.comment: FALSE - camera is set in PC and PC cannot be controlled

SC_PC_EnableMovement.name: SC_PC_EnableMovement
SC_PC_EnableMovement.comment: FALSE - player cannot move , but can look around)

SC_PC_EnablePronePosition.name: SC_PC_EnablePronePosition
SC_PC_EnablePronePosition.comment: default is TRUE, use FALSE to disable lieing ( in tunnels f.e.)

SC_PC_EnableWeaponsUsing.name: SC_PC_EnableWeaponsUsing
SC_PC_EnableWeaponsUsing.comment: default is TRUE, use FALSE to disable shooting, weapons, change, reload, mode changing

SC_PC_PlayFpvAnim2.name: SC_PC_PlayFpvAnim2
SC_PC_PlayFpvAnim2.comment: bes - object to link - index to PreLoadBes  ( SC_PreloadBES )

SC_PC_PlayFpvLooped.name: SC_PC_PlayFpvLooped
SC_PC_PlayFpvLooped.comment: fpv animation to play looped, use NULL to stop fpv animation

SC_P_IsReady.name: SC_P_IsReady
SC_P_IsReady.comment: returns whether player is ready (is created and recovered, but death)

SC_P_GetHasShoot.name: SC_P_GetHasShoot
SC_P_GetHasShoot.comment: returns TRUE when player shot from the last function call

SC_P_GetWillTalk.name: SC_P_GetWillTalk
SC_P_GetWillTalk.comment: returns time in sec, when player will finish his last buffered speech

SC_P_GetTalking.name: SC_P_GetTalking
SC_P_GetTalking.comment: returns TRUE if player is talking right now

SC_P_EnableLonelyWolfKiller.name: SC_P_EnableLonelyWolfKiller
SC_P_EnableLonelyWolfKiller.comment: if nearest ally is farrer from player then distance

SC_P_SetFaceStatus.name: SC_P_SetFaceStatus
SC_P_SetFaceStatus.comment: changes players face for selected time

SC_P_SetRadarColor.name: SC_P_SetRadarColor
SC_P_SetRadarColor.comment: val is SC_P_RADARCOLOR_xxxxx or RGB color

SC_P_RemoveAllSpeech.name: SC_P_RemoveAllSpeech
SC_P_RemoveAllSpeech.comment: when pl_id is 0, all speech is removed

SC_P_RemoveAllSpeechEx.name: SC_P_RemoveAllSpeechEx
SC_P_RemoveAllSpeechEx.comment: include_active  - TRUE - removes also already active ( running ) speech

SC_P_Ai_SetBattleModeExt.name: SC_P_Ai_SetBattleModeExt
SC_P_Ai_SetBattleModeExt.comment: param is valid for SC_P_AI_BATTLEMODE_GOTO only

SC_P_Ai_EnableShooting.name: SC_P_Ai_EnableShooting
SC_P_Ai_EnableShooting.comment: FALSE or TRUE to disable or enable shooting

SC_P_Ai_EnterCar.name: SC_P_Ai_EnterCar
SC_P_Ai_EnterCar.comment: enter_pos - position where is possible to enter the car, NULL = everywhere

SC_P_Ai_SetBattleProps.name: SC_P_Ai_SetBattleProps
SC_P_Ai_SetBattleProps.comment: NULL means engine default algorithms(results differ depends on battle situation)

SC_P_Ai_GetNearestEnemyDist.name: SC_P_Ai_GetNearestEnemyDist
SC_P_Ai_GetNearestEnemyDist.comment: returns FLT_MAX if no enemy found

SC_P_Ai_JumpInNextFrame.name: SC_P_Ai_JumpInNextFrame
SC_P_Ai_JumpInNextFrame.comment: AI will press jump in next frame...

SC_P_Ai_WalkThruAIs.name: SC_P_Ai_WalkThruAIs
SC_P_Ai_WalkThruAIs.comment: enables switching of other AIs when walking thru, default is FALSE

SC_P_Ai_SetMedicIngMaxActiveDist.name: SC_P_Ai_SetMedicIngMaxActiveDist
SC_P_Ai_SetMedicIngMaxActiveDist.comment: default is 0 that means no limit

SC_Ai_SetBattleModeExt.name: SC_Ai_SetBattleModeExt
SC_Ai_SetBattleModeExt.comment: param is valid for SC_P_AI_BATTLEMODE_GOTO only

SC_Ai_PointStopDanger.name: SC_Ai_PointStopDanger
SC_Ai_PointStopDanger.comment: points reacts fast, the rest with delay

SC_Ai_StopDanger.name: SC_Ai_StopDanger
SC_Ai_StopDanger.comment: all reacts very fast (used when user shoot in peace mode f.e.)

SC_Ai_FakeEnemy_Add.name: SC_Ai_FakeEnemy_Add
SC_Ai_FakeEnemy_Add.comment: when fake_enemy==NULL, area_spheres==0 and area_sphere==NULL, it's a general danger (AI moves thru hideouts without hidding)

SC_Ai_FakeDanger.name: SC_Ai_FakeDanger
SC_Ai_FakeDanger.comment: AI players move out of the sphere, time is live time of this danger

SC_Ai_SetGroupEnemyUpdate.name: SC_Ai_SetGroupEnemyUpdate
SC_Ai_SetGroupEnemyUpdate.comment: enable - TRUE - player in this groups informs themselves about enemies

SC_Set_RadioMan_RunDist.name: SC_Set_RadioMan_RunDist
SC_Set_RadioMan_RunDist.comment: 0 is default and means no limit

SC_MissionFailedDeathPlayer.name: SC_MissionFailedDeathPlayer
SC_MissionFailedDeathPlayer.comment: make Mission failed and camera looks at defined player

SC_MP_P_GetAfterRecoverSide.name: SC_MP_P_GetAfterRecoverSide
SC_MP_P_GetAfterRecoverSide.comment: returns side of player after his respawn

SC_MP_AddPlayerScript.name: SC_MP_AddPlayerScript
SC_MP_AddPlayerScript.comment: filename is *.c name of the script

SC_MP_SRV_InitWeaponsRecovery.name: SC_MP_SRV_InitWeaponsRecovery
SC_MP_SRV_InitWeaponsRecovery.comment: 0 - recover immediatelly, >0 - recover after time, <0 - hide items

SC_MP_AllowFriendlyFireOFF.name: SC_MP_AllowFriendlyFireOFF
SC_MP_AllowFriendlyFireOFF.comment: set TRUE for TeamBased Games, FALSE for others ( DM, CTR, LMS )

SC_MP_EnableBotsFromScene.name: SC_MP_EnableBotsFromScene
SC_MP_EnableBotsFromScene.comment: default value when starting mission is FALSE

SC_MP_EnableC4weapon.name: SC_MP_EnableC4weapon
SC_MP_EnableC4weapon.comment: calling with TRUE for ATG bombing gametypes

SC_MP_RecoverAllNoAiPlayers.name: SC_MP_RecoverAllNoAiPlayers
SC_MP_RecoverAllNoAiPlayers.comment: for MP only, valid on server only

SC_MP_RecoverAllAiPlayers.name: SC_MP_RecoverAllAiPlayers
SC_MP_RecoverAllAiPlayers.comment: for MP only, valid on server only

SC_MP_GetSRVsettings.name: SC_MP_GetSRVsettings
SC_MP_GetSRVsettings.comment: returns setting of server for various game types

SC_MP_GetRecovers.name: SC_MP_GetRecovers
SC_MP_GetRecovers.comment: items is a size of list and after function end it contains number of recovers stored there

SC_MP_RecoverAiPlayer.name: SC_MP_RecoverAiPlayer
SC_MP_RecoverAiPlayer.comment: if pos==NULL, the default respawn place is used

SC_GLOBAL_H.name: SC_GLOBAL_H
SC_GLOBAL_H.comment: game engine version to compile for

SC_P_CREATE_FL_MP_RECOVER.name: SC_P_CREATE_FL_MP_RECOVER
SC_P_CREATE_FL_MP_RECOVER.comment: player is recovered by multiplayer script

SC_P_CREATE_FL_DISABLE_EQPGEN.name: SC_P_CREATE_FL_DISABLE_EQPGEN
SC_P_CREATE_FL_DISABLE_EQPGEN.comment: disble automatic equipment generation when eqps==0

SC_P_CREATE_FL_FORCESELSLOT.name: SC_P_CREATE_FL_FORCESELSLOT
SC_P_CREATE_FL_FORCESELSLOT.comment: flags for PC only - player will be created with selected weapon in slot info.force_sel_slot

SC_LEV_MES_VIEWANIMCALLBACK.name: SC_LEV_MES_VIEWANIMCALLBACK
SC_LEV_MES_VIEWANIMCALLBACK.comment: info->param1 includes callback_id defined in SC_SetViewAnim()

SC_LEV_MES_INITSCENE.name: SC_LEV_MES_INITSCENE
SC_LEV_MES_INITSCENE.comment: is called just after scene loaded ( new start or load gamesave)

SC_NET_MES_SERVER_KILL.name: SC_NET_MES_SERVER_KILL
SC_NET_MES_SERVER_KILL.comment: param1 - who is killed, param2 - who killed him

SC_NET_MES_LEVELPREINIT.name: SC_NET_MES_LEVELPREINIT
SC_NET_MES_LEVELPREINIT.comment: mission preinit ( level is not loaded yet)

SC_NET_MES_RESTARTMAP.name: SC_NET_MES_RESTARTMAP
SC_NET_MES_RESTARTMAP.comment: clears statisticks, end_rule and recovers players

SC_PL_AI_SIT_IFL_MWP.name: SC_PL_AI_SIT_IFL_MWP
SC_PL_AI_SIT_IFL_MWP.comment: ignore all players in using mwp

GVAR_MP_MISSIONSUBTYPE.name: GVAR_MP_MISSIONSUBTYPE
GVAR_MP_MISSIONSUBTYPE.comment: predefined values, use some other for own MP missiontypes

SC_P_MES_HIT.name: SC_P_MES_HIT
SC_P_MES_HIT.comment: param1 is pl_id of shooter, but CAN BE 0 in some special cases !

SC_P_MES_INTERACT_GETTEXT.name: SC_P_MES_INTERACT_GETTEXT
SC_P_MES_INTERACT_GETTEXT.comment: return value in param1, if zero, no interaction possible

SC_P_MES_INTERACT_DO.name: SC_P_MES_INTERACT_DO
SC_P_MES_INTERACT_DO.comment: interaction was enabled and pc used it

SC_P_MES_KILLED.name: SC_P_MES_KILLED
SC_P_MES_KILLED.comment: param1 is pl_id of shooter, but CAN BE 0 in some special cases !

SC_MP_RESPAWN_TT_ATT_5.name: SC_MP_RESPAWN_TT_ATT_5
SC_MP_RESPAWN_TT_ATT_5.comment: variable types definition and some general defines
